GPIO_P0_DR.description: Port 0 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P0.0 to P0.7. Physical pins: P0.0, P0.1, P0.2, P0.3, P0.6, P0.7.

GPIO_P1_DR.description: Port 1 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P1.0 to P1.7.

GPIO_P2_DR.description: Port 2 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P2.0 to P2.3.

GPIO_P3_DR.description: Port 3 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P3.0 to P3.2.

GPIO_P4_DR.description: Port 4 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P4.0 to P4.1.

GPIO_P5_DR.description: Port 5 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P5.0 to P5.2.

GPIO_P6_DR.description: Port 6 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P6.0 to P6.1.

GPIO_P7_DR.description: Port 7 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pins P7.0 to P7.2.

GPIO_P12_DR.description: Port 12 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pin P12.0.

GPIO_P13_DR.description: Port 13 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pin P13.0.

GPIO_P14_DR.description: Port 14 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pin P14.0.

GPIO_P15_DR.description: Port 15 Data Register. Used for reading input data and writing output data for pin P15.0.

GPIO_PM0_MODER.description: Port 0 Mode Register. Configures pins P0.0 to P0.7 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM1_MODER.description: Port 1 Mode Register. Configures pins P1.0 to P1.7 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM2_MODER.description: Port 2 Mode Register. Configures pins P2.0 to P2.3 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM3_MODER.description: Port 3 Mode Register. Configures pins P3.0 to P3.2 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM4_MODER.description: Port 4 Mode Register. Configures pins P4.0 to P4.1 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM5_MODER.description: Port 5 Mode Register. Configures pins P5.0 to P5.2 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM6_MODER.description: Port 6 Mode Register. Configures pins P6.0 to P6.1 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM7_MODER.description: Port 7 Mode Register. Configures pins P7.0 to P7.2 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM12_MODER.description: Port 12 Mode Register. Configures pin P12.0 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM13_MODER.description: Port 13 Mode Register. Configures pin P13.0 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM14_MODER.description: Port 14 Mode Register. Configures pin P14.0 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PM15_MODER.description: Port 15 Mode Register. Configures pin P15.0 as input or output mode.

GPIO_PMC0_AFR.description: Port 0 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P0.0 to P0.7.

GPIO_PMC1_AFR.description: Port 1 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P1.0 to P1.7.

GPIO_PMC2_AFR.description: Port 2 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P2.0 to P2.3.

GPIO_PMC3_AFR.description: Port 3 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P3.0 to P3.2.

GPIO_PMC4_AFR.description: Port 4 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P4.0 to P4.1.

GPIO_PMC5_AFR.description: Port 5 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P5.0 to P5.2.

GPIO_PMC6_AFR.description: Port 6 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P6.0 to P6.1.

GPIO_PMC7_AFR.description: Port 7 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pins P7.0 to P7.2.

GPIO_PMC13_AFR.description: Port 13 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pin P13.0.

GPIO_PMC14_AFR.description: Port 14 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pin P14.0.

GPIO_PMC15_AFR.description: Port 15 Mode Control Register. Selects digital input buffer or analog input for pin P15.0.

GPIO_PIM0_PUPDR.description: Port 0 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P0.0 to P0.7.

GPIO_PIM1_PUPDR.description: Port 1 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P1.0 to P1.7.

GPIO_PIM2_PUPDR.description: Port 2 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P2.0 to P2.3.

GPIO_PIM3_PUPDR.description: Port 3 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P3.0 to P3.2.

GPIO_PIM4_PUPDR.description: Port 4 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P4.0 to P4.1.

GPIO_PIM6_PUPDR.description: Port 6 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P6.0 to P6.1.

GPIO_PIM7_PUPDR.description: Port 7 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pins P7.0 to P7.2.

GPIO_PIM12_PUPDR.description: Port 12 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pin P12.0.

GPIO_PIM13_PUPDR.description: Port 13 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pin P13.0.

GPIO_PIM14_PUPDR.description: Port 14 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pin P14.0.

GPIO_PIM15_PUPDR.description: Port 15 Input Mode Register. Configures input buffer type (e.g., pull-up) for pin P15.0.

GPIO_POM0_OTYPER.description: Port 0 Output Mode Register. Configures output buffer type (e.g., normal or open-drain) for pins P0.0 to P0.7.

GPIO_POM1_OTYPER.description: Port 1 Output Mode Register. Configures output buffer type (e.g., normal or open-drain) for pins P1.0 to P1.7.

GPIO_POM2_OTYPER.description: Port 2 Output Mode Register. Configures output buffer type (e.g., normal or open-drain) for pins P2.0 to P2.3.

RCC_OSMC.description: Oscillation Mode Control Register. Controls the operation of the main and sub-oscillators.

RCC_CSC.description: Clock Stop Control Register. Manages the stopping and starting of peripheral clocks.

RCC_CKC.description: Clock Control Register. Selects the clock source for the CPU and peripherals.

RCC_PRCR.description: Protect Register. Enables or disables write access to specific protected registers, commonly clock and security related.

RCC_TRC.description: TRIM Control Register. Adjusts the trimming values for internal oscillation circuits.

RCC_LVIM.description: Low Voltage Detection Interrupt Mask Register. Masks or unmasks the low voltage detection interrupt.

RCC_LVINM.description: Low Voltage Detection Interrupt Flag Mask Register. Masks or unmasks the low voltage detection interrupt flag.

RCC_LVIS.description: Low Voltage Reset Enable Register. Enables or disables the low voltage detection reset function.

TIM0_CR1.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Control Register 1. Contains bits for starting Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TS0).

TIM0_CR2.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Control Register 2. Contains bits for stopping Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TT0).

TIM0_CR3.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Control Register 3. Contains bits for enabling Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TE0).

TIM0_SR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Status Register. Provides the status of Timer Array Unit 0 channels (TSR0).

TIM0_GCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Global Mode Register. Configures global settings for TAU0 (TRGMR0).

TIM0_CH0_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Mode Register (TMR00). Configures operation mode for channel 0.

TIM0_CH1_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Mode Register (TMR01). Configures operation mode for channel 1.

TIM0_CH2_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Mode Register (TMR02). Configures operation mode for channel 2.

TIM0_CH3_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Mode Register (TMR03). Configures operation mode for channel 3.

TIM0_CH4_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 4 Mode Register (TMR04). Configures operation mode for channel 4.

TIM0_CH5_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 5 Mode Register (TMR05). Configures operation mode for channel 5.

TIM0_CH6_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 6 Mode Register (TMR06). Configures operation mode for channel 6.

TIM0_CH7_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 7 Mode Register (TMR07). Configures operation mode for channel 7.

TIM0_CH0_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Control Register (TCR00). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH1_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Control Register (TCR01). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH2_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Control Register (TCR02). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH3_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Control Register (TCR03). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH4_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 4 Control Register (TCR04). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH5_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 5 Control Register (TCR05). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH6_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 6 Control Register (TCR06). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CH7_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 7 Control Register (TCR07). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM0_CCR0.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Capture/Compare Register (TDR00). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR1.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Capture/Compare Register (TDR01). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR2.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Capture/Compare Register (TDR02). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR3.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Capture/Compare Register (TDR03). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR4.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 4 Capture/Compare Register (TDR04). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR5.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 5 Capture/Compare Register (TDR05). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR6.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 6 Capture/Compare Register (TDR06). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CCR7.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 7 Capture/Compare Register (TDR07). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM0_CNT0.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Counter Register (TR00). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT1.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Counter Register (TR01). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT2.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Counter Register (TR02). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT3.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Counter Register (TR03). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT4.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 4 Counter Register (TR04). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT5.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 5 Counter Register (TR05). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT6.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 6 Counter Register (TR06). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM0_CNT7.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Channel 7 Counter Register (TR07). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM1_CR1.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Control Register 1. Contains bits for starting Timer Array Unit 1 channels (TS1).

TIM1_CR2.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Control Register 2. Contains bits for stopping Timer Array Unit 1 channels (TT1).

TIM1_CR3.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Control Register 3. Contains bits for enabling Timer Array Unit 1 channels (TE1).

TIM1_SR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Status Register. Provides the status of Timer Array Unit 1 channels (TSR1).

TIM1_GCR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Global Mode Register. Configures global settings for TAU1 (TRGMR1).

TIM1_CH0_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 0 Mode Register (TMR10). Configures operation mode for channel 0.

TIM1_CH1_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 1 Mode Register (TMR11). Configures operation mode for channel 1.

TIM1_CH2_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 2 Mode Register (TMR12). Configures operation mode for channel 2.

TIM1_CH3_CR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 3 Mode Register (TMR13). Configures operation mode for channel 3.

TIM1_CH0_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 0 Control Register (TCR10). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM1_CH1_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 1 Control Register (TCR11). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM1_CH2_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 2 Control Register (TCR12). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM1_CH3_CCR.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 3 Control Register (TCR13). Configures compare or capture operations.

TIM1_CCR0.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 0 Capture/Compare Register (TDR10). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM1_CCR1.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 1 Capture/Compare Register (TDR11). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM1_CCR2.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 2 Capture/Compare Register (TDR12). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM1_CCR3.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 3 Capture/Compare Register (TDR13). Stores captured value or compare value.

TIM1_CNT0.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 0 Counter Register (TR10). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM1_CNT1.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 1 Counter Register (TR11). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM1_CNT2.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 2 Counter Register (TR12). Reads the current timer counter value.

TIM1_CNT3.description: Timer Array Unit 1 Channel 3 Counter Register (TR13). Reads the current timer counter value.

ADC_CR1.description: AD Converter Mode Register 0 (ADM0). Controls ADC operation mode, conversion settings.

ADC_CR2.description: AD Converter Mode Register 1 (ADM1). Controls ADC trigger source and interrupt settings.

ADC_DR.description: AD Converter Register (ADCR). Stores the result of A/D conversion.

ADC_TEST_REG.description: AD Test Register (ADTES). Used for ADC test functions.

USART_SPS0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Clock Select Register. Configures the clock divisor for all SAU0 channels. Shared with SPI and I2C modes.

USART0_CH0_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Mode Register (SMR00). Configures UART0 channel 0 operation mode (e.g., Rx). Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 channels.

USART0_CH0_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Control Register (SCR00). Configures UART0 channel 0 control bits. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 channels.

USART0_DR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Data Register (SDR00). Transmit/receive data for UART0. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 data registers.

USART0_CH1_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Mode Register (SMR01). Configures UART0 channel 1 operation mode (e.g., Tx). Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 channels.

USART0_CH1_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Control Register (SCR01). Configures UART0 channel 1 control bits. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 channels.

USART0_DR_CH1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Data Register (SDR01). Transmit/receive data for UART0. Often used in conjunction with SDR00. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 data registers.

USART1_CH0_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Mode Register (SMR02). Configures UART1 channel 0 operation mode (e.g., Rx). Shared with CSI10 channels.

USART1_CH0_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Control Register (SCR02). Configures UART1 channel 0 control bits. Shared with CSI10 channels.

USART1_DR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Data Register (SDR02). Transmit/receive data for UART1. Shared with CSI10 data registers.

USART1_CH1_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Mode Register (SMR03). Configures UART1 channel 1 operation mode (e.g., Tx). Shared with CSI10 channels.

USART1_CH1_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Control Register (SCR03). Configures UART1 channel 1 control bits. Shared with CSI10 channels.

USART1_DR_CH1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Data Register (SDR03). Transmit/receive data for UART1. Often used in conjunction with SDR02. Shared with CSI10 data registers.

USART0_SR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Status Register (SSR00). Indicates UART0 transmission/reception status. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 status.

USART0_IER.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Interrupt Register (SIR00). Sets interrupt flags for UART0. Shared with SPI0 and I2C0 interrupts.

USART_SISR0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Status Indication Register. Provides combined status for all SAU0 channels. Shared with SPI and I2C modes.

USART_SCLMR0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Control Mode Register. Configures various control settings for SAU0. Shared with SPI and I2C modes.

I2C0_CR1.description: IIC Bus Control Register 0 (IICCTL0). Controls I2C operation including enable/disable and master/slave mode.

I2C0_CR2.description: IIC Bus Control Register 1 (IICCTL1). Controls I2C interrupt settings and clock control.

I2C0_TLOWR.description: IIC Bus Wait Time Low Register (IICWL). Sets the low period of the I2C clock (SCL).

I2C0_THIGH.description: IIC Bus Wait Time High Register (IICWH). Sets the high period of the I2C clock (SCL).

I2C0_SLAVE_ADDR.description: Slave Address Register (SVA). Stores the 7-bit slave address for I2C communication.

I2C0_TXDR.description: Transmit Data Register (TXDT). Data register for I2C transmission.

I2C0_RXDR.description: Receive Data Register (RXDT). Data register for I2C reception.

I2C0_SR.description: IIC Bus Status Register (IICS). Provides current status of the I2C bus.

SPI_SPS0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Clock Select Register. Configures the clock divisor for all SAU0 channels. Shared with USART and I2C modes.

SPI0_CH0_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Mode Register (SMR00). Configures SPI0 channel 0 operation mode. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 channels.

SPI0_CH0_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Control Register (SCR00). Configures SPI0 channel 0 control bits. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 channels.

SPI0_DR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Data Register (SDR00). Transmit/receive data for SPI0. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 data registers.

SPI0_CH1_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Mode Register (SMR01). Configures SPI0 channel 1 operation mode. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 channels.

SPI0_CH1_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Control Register (SCR01). Configures SPI0 channel 1 control bits. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 channels.

SPI0_DR_CH1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 1 Data Register (SDR01). Transmit/receive data for SPI0. Often used in conjunction with SDR00. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 data registers.

SPI1_CH0_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Mode Register (SMR02). Configures SPI1 channel 0 operation mode. Shared with USART1 channels.

SPI1_CH0_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Control Register (SCR02). Configures SPI1 channel 0 control bits. Shared with USART1 channels.

SPI1_DR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 2 Data Register (SDR02). Transmit/receive data for SPI1. Shared with USART1 data registers.

SPI1_CH1_CR1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Mode Register (SMR03). Configures SPI1 channel 1 operation mode. Shared with USART1 channels.

SPI1_CH1_CR2.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Control Register (SCR03). Configures SPI1 channel 1 control bits. Shared with USART1 channels.

SPI1_DR_CH1.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 3 Data Register (SDR03). Transmit/receive data for SPI1. Often used in conjunction with SDR02. Shared with USART1 data registers.

SPI0_SR.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Status Register (SSR00). Indicates SPI0 transmission/reception status. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 status.

SPI0_IER.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Channel 0 Interrupt Register (SIR00). Sets interrupt flags for SPI0. Shared with USART0 and I2C0 interrupts.

SPI_SISR0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Status Indication Register. Provides combined status for all SAU0 channels. Shared with USART and I2C modes.

SPI_SCLMR0.description: Serial Array Unit 0 Control Mode Register. Configures various control settings for SAU0. Shared with USART and I2C modes.
